creator: chirag84@gmail.com
text:
I have a simple application which displays the database tables data on the frontend using JSP. Data is not displaying completely on the browser for large tables in the newer version. However, when i run the same application on the older version 5.x, it works very well. 
When I see the source code of the generated html, it is incomplete and truncated in the middle. 
I tried 3 days to solve this issue on the newer version playing with buffering and all without any success. 
Please check and let me know if this is a bug in the newer version or if I need to configure a setting on the newer version. 

It seems to be an big issue. 

I cannot attached the source code as it is client specific. 

Thanks
Chirag Gupta

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Bugzilla isn't a support forum. Please use the users list to debug this. If, as a result of that, you confirm that there is a bug please feel free to re-open this issue and add the details to reproduce it.
